articles.description: Football often divides opinion - but everyone is united to hail Spain's Euro 2024 success as fully deserved.
articles.title: Spain win Euro 2024: 'The best team lifted European Championship trophy', says pundits

articles.description: Rio Ferdinand, Micah Richards, Alan Shearer and other pundits react to England's defeat by Spain in the Euro 2024 final.
articles.title: England lose Euro 2024 final: Pundits react to defeat by Spain

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate says now is "not a good time" to make a decision on his future.
articles.title: Gareth Southgate says 'now not a good time' to decide his future

articles.description: After an "all-round perfect performance" to stun Novak Djokovic, BBC Sport looks at how high the Spaniard could still reach.
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz: What next for Wimbledon champion after winning title?

articles.description: Seven-time Wimbledon champion Noval Djokovic says he's 'not at level' of Carlos Alcaraz or Jannik Sinner after final defeat
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024: Novak Djokovic says he's not at level of Carlos Alcaraz or Jannik Sinner after final defeat

articles.description: Spain's Lamine Yamal has broken countless records in the past 15 months - and caps it all off by becoming the youngest European Championship winner ever.
articles.title: Lamine Yamal's year of records - Spain star adds one more in Euro 2024 final

articles.description: Captain Harry Kane says England's 2-1 defeat by Spain in the final of Euro 2024 will "hurt for a long time".
articles.title: Euro 2024 final: England captain Harry Kane says defeat 'will hurt for a long time'

articles.description: Manchester United sign Bologna and Netherlands striker Joshua Zirkzee in a deal worth £36.54m.
articles.title: Joshua Zirkzee: Manchester United sign Bologna striker in £36.54m deal

articles.description: Former Baltimore Ravens wide receiver and Super Bowl winner Jacoby Jones dies aged 40.
articles.title: Jacoby Jones: Super Bowl winner with Baltimore Ravens dies aged 40

articles.description: Tadej Pogacar takes a huge step towards reclaiming the Tour de France title as he claims a second straight stage win.
articles.title: Tour de France 2024: Tadej Pogacar claims another dominant win on stage 15
